message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you $40 while I take $60. I want to be transparent that I face 20% inflation each round, so waiting costs me significantly. This is a fair split considering my constraints, and we can both walk away with money right now.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your transparency about the inflation you face. I propose we split the $100 with me receiving $45 and you receiving $55. This gives us both a fair amount while considering the inflation risk moving forward.
